build.divertors.lower.installed.documentation: 1 if a lower divertor is installed

build.divertors.upper.installed.documentation: 1 if a upper divertor is installed

build.flux_swing.flattop.documentation: Total flux required for the plasma flattop

build.flux_swing.pf.documentation: Contribution of vertical field from PF coils to flux swing

build.flux_swing.rampup.documentation: Total flux required for the plasma rampup

build.layer.documentation: List of layers in the radial build

build.layer[:].area.documentation: Cross sectional area of the layer

build.layer[:].identifier.documentation: Integer to identify the same layer on the high-field-side and low-field-side

build.layer[:].material.documentation: List of materials that comprise the layer

build.layer[:].material[:].composition.documentation: Fraction of layer comprised of the specified material

build.layer[:].outline.documentation: Irregular outline of the limiting surface. Do NOT repeat the first point for closed contours

build.layer[:].shape.documentation: Integer to identify the physical shape of the layer

build.layer[:].shape_parameters.documentation: List of the shape specific parameters for given shape type

build.layer[:].side.documentation: Integer set to -1 if layer is on the low-field-side and 1 if layer is on the high-field-side. 0 for plasma. 2 for inner (eg. OH) and 3 for outer (eg. cryostat)

build.layer[:].type.documentation:
Layer type code
0) vacuum (use this to set mimimum radius for OH)
1) OH
2) TF
3) BL
4) Shielding
5) Wall
-1) Vacuum vessel

build.layer[:].volume_no_structures.documentation: Volume of the layer without structures

build.oh.critical_b_field.documentation: Critical magnetic field density to quench superconducting OH

build.oh.critical_j.documentation: Critical current density to quench superconducting OH

build.oh.max_b_field.documentation: Maximum magnetic field in the OH solenoid, as required to satisfy rampup and flattop flux consumption

build.oh.max_j.documentation: Maximum current density in the OH solenoid, as required to satisfy rampup and flattop flux consumption

build.oh.technology.JxB_strain.documentation: Fraction of maximum JxB strain over maximum total strain on the OH coils

build.oh.technology.fraction_steel.documentation: Fraction of stainless steel in the OH coils cross-sectional areas

build.oh.technology.fraction_void.documentation: Fraction of `void` in the OH coils cross-sectional area. Void is everything (like coolant) that is not structural nor conductor

build.oh.technology.ratio_SC_to_copper.documentation: Fraction of superconductor to copper cross-sectional areas in OH coils

build.oh.technology.thermal_strain.documentation: Fraction of thermal expansion strain over maximum total strain on the OH coils

build.pf_active.rail.documentation: List of rails where the PF coils can slide on

build.pf_active.rail[:].coils_cleareance.documentation: Clereance that coils have from other structures

build.pf_active.rail[:].coils_number.documentation: Number of coils on the rail

build.pf_active.rail[:].outline.documentation: Irregular (possibly not-continuous) outline of the rail surface

build.pf_active.rail[:].outline.distance.documentation: Distance along the rail skipping gaps

build.pf_active.technology.JxB_strain.documentation: Fraction of maximum JxB strain over maximum total strain on the PF coils

build.pf_active.technology.fraction_stee.documentation: Fraction of stainless steel in the PF coils cross-sectional areas

build.pf_active.technology.fraction_void.documentation: Fraction of `void` in the PF coils cross-sectional area. Void is everything (like coolant) that is not structural nor conductor

build.pf_active.technology.ratio_SC_to_c.documentation: Fraction of superconductor to copper cross-sectional areas in the PF coils

build.pf_active.technology.thermal_strai.documentation: Fraction of thermal expansion strain over maximum total strain on the PF coils

build.structure.documentation: List of structures in the build

build.structure[:].area.documentation: Cross sectional area of the structure

build.structure[:].outline.documentation: Irregular outline of the limiting surface. Do NOT repeat the first point for closed contours

build.tf.coils_n.documentation: Number of TF coils around the torus

build.tf.critical_b_field.documentation: Critical magnetic field to quench superconducting TF

build.tf.critical_j.documentation: Critical current density to quench superconducting TF

build.tf.max_b_field.documentation: Maximum magnetic field evaluated at the TF high-field side

build.tf.max_j.documentation: Maximum current density in the TF solenoid

build.tf.ripple.documentation: Fraction of toroidal field ripple evaluated at the outermost radius of the plasma chamber

build.tf.technology.JxB_strain.documentation: Fraction of maximum JxB strain over maximum total strain on the TF coils

build.tf.technology.fraction_steel.documentation: Fraction of stainless steel in the TF coils cross-sectional areas

build.tf.technology.fraction_void.documentation: Fraction of `void` in the TF coils cross-sectional area. Void is everything (like coolant) that is not structural nor conductor

build.tf.technology.ratio_SC_to_copper.documentation: Fraction of superconductor to copper cross-sectional areas in the TF coils

build.tf.technology.thermal_strain.documentation: Fraction of thermal expansion strain over maximum total strain on the TF coils

build.tf.wedge_thickness.documentation: Thickness of the TF coils wedge evaluated
